description:
Turnover from e-commerce

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services

Definition:
E-commerce stands for electronic commerce. It comprises all
purchases and sales of goods and services via electronic
networks such as the internet or EDI (Electronic Data
Interchange).
EDI refers to the electronic exchange of data in a formatted
form (for instance, based on the EDI FACT standard) between
computer systems of different businesses, using so-called
permanent lines. An example is the exchange of data via
telephone lines.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Turnover from e-commerce
